QuestData.Title: Visions of Fear
QuestData.Description:
I've done it, $Glad:lass;. I've reached him again!
Oh, but it's so painful. So painful! He's not doin' well, not one bit!
You'll have to listen on in with me to understand.
QuestData.RewardText: The Pantheon has been dead for thousands of years... I fear this plan has been in the works for a very, very long time.
